title: Bag of salt

properties.name: description
properties.value: Bags of salt can be purchased from any Slayer master, and are used to finish off rockslugs that have less than 5 Hitpoints. When used, the rockslug shrivels up and dies, consuming the bag of salt. Using a bag of salt on a rockslug with 5 or more Hitpoints has no effect but will still consume a bag of salt.

The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Bag of salt
This article is about the slayer item. For the quest item, see pile of salt.

Item ID4161

Bags of salt can be purchased from any Slayer master, and are used to finish off rockslugs that have less than 5 Hitpoints. When used, the rockslug shrivels up and dies, consuming the bag of salt. Using a bag of salt on a rockslug with 5 or more Hitpoints has no effect but will still consume a bag of salt.

A bag (or pile) of salt is required during Icthlarin's Little Helper.

[[File:Bag of salt detail.png|left|100px]]
'''Bags of salt''' can be purchased from any [[Slayer master]], and are used to finish off [[rockslug]]s that have less than 5 [[Hitpoints]]. When used, the rockslug shrivels up and dies, consuming the bag of salt. Using a bag of salt on a rockslug with 5 or more Hitpoints has no effect but will still consume a bag of salt.

A bag (or [[Pile of salt|pile]]) of salt is required during [[Icthlarin's Little Helper]].
